price: តែទោះបីជាពួកគេបានឃើញមុជីហ្សាត់ក៏ដោយ ក៏ពួកគេ នៅតែងាកចេញ ហើយនិយាយថាៈ នេះគឺជាមន្ដអាគមដ៏ច្បាស់លាស់ដែរ ។
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw āyatan yuʿ'riḍū wayaqūlū siḥ'run mus'tamirrun
